name: Cataegis - The White Wind: Ziggurat Chapter
name_original: Cataegis - The White Wind: Ziggurat Chapter
description:
Cataegis - The White Wind: Ziggurat Chapter brings back the joy of frantic retro arcade action to your PC!

It's True Arcade!

With agile movements and a varied arsenal to your disposal, face your foes toe to toe using all the maneuvers you have from double jumping, sliding, and dual wield weapons as you assume the role of Cataegis, from the Caeliger Order.

The Deity Descends

When a deity claiming to be Ishtar surfaces claiming she will eradicate death from Earth, the Caeliger Order answers sending their most skilled enforcer - Cataegis - to erase Ishtar's existence.

Your Decisions Matter

However, things aren't as simple as they seem and your choices will affect your game - once you make it to the Ishtar's Ziggurat, you'll be able to spare your opponents, and whether you gain allies or leave someone alive to try another attempt on your life is anyone's guess.

32 Endings, 18 Data Files and music to unlock!

Features:

- Exciting Retro soundtrack;
- Fast and fluid gameplay with a myriad of techniques and varied weapons;
- Gorgeous pixel art cinemas;
- Good ol' old-school challenge!

For more screenshots, please check here.

You can get in touch with us at:
